description:
11.222 scroll
Scroll input video horizontally and/or vertically by constant speed.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: scroll

options.description: Set the horizontal scrolling speed. Default is 0. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Negative values changes scrolling direction.
options.name: horizontal

options.description: Set the vertical scrolling speed. Default is 0. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Negative values changes scrolling direction.
options.name: vertical

options.description: Set the initial horizontal scrolling position. Default is 0. Allowed range is from 0 to 1.
options.name: hpos

options.description: Set the initial vertical scrolling position. Default is 0. Allowed range is from 0 to 1.
options.name: vpos
